data.text:
About Daniel

I am currently enrolled in George Fox University and I have been speaking Spanish for most of my life, Spanish is one of my majors, as well as music and I have spent so much of my life surrounded by Spanish related subjects and activities, I love to play soccer and all of my musical instruments and go outdoors and admire the beauty of nature.

See more

About the lesson

All Levels

English

All languages in which the lesson is available :

English

I can help quiz and teach you on vocabulary words for Spanish and build up your grammar, while teaching you how to speak confidently and clearly. I will help you to be able to hear what people are saying in order to help you respond. I am very driven towards my Spanish language and helping others learn Spanish. I can teach a variety of ages, from elementary school up until high school.

See more
